name: Blazing Prismshell
description: A whole piece of radiant shell liberated from a Furnace Shell MountainWeasel's back after its defeat.  It is said that the more Phlogiston a Furnace Shell Mountain Weasel has storedin its back, the higher its status in the pack. The reasoning for thisphenomenon may be quite simple: More dominant Furnace Shell Mountain Weaselslikely have less need to call on their Phlogiston reserves than their lessprominent peers.
